Take a look at my work!

As a ui/ux designer, I strive to create products that are both functional and beautiful. As a front-end web developer, I work to write code that is both elegant and accessible.

| About

I have been learning and developing for the web for a year and a half. Programming and design has become a passion of mine and I am continuously looking for opportunities to apply my new skills and ideas. I have mainly focused my efforts on front-end design and development learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as css and web frameworks such as Bootstrap 4 and Angular.

In this time, I have worked on some personal and community projects. Don't just take my word for it, check out some of the projects that are here on this website. I am currently looking for further opportunities to gain experience in web development and am very open to new opportunities and connections.

Feel free to send me an email!
